articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Bier of Great King Norodom Sihanouk
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Bier of Great King Norodom Sihanouk
						
 Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un sent a wreath to the bier of Great King Norodom Sihanouk of Cambodia, expressing profound condolences over his passing.
					 The wreath was laid before the bier of the deceased placed at the royal palace on Oct. 19.
					
					The ribbon of the wreath bore the words "Kim Jong Un", "I Mourn the Passing of His Majesty the Great King Norodom Sihanouk."
